resources.string: Bubble chat is a bubbly and fun medium to communicate with your friends! Using only pictures and drawings you can share your life with friends in your Bubble Room.
A bubble room is our take on the modern news feed. Inside a Bubble Room you can play with the various bubbles as well as click a bubble for a stable and enlarged view.
All shared content is not saved. Bubbles exist only in the current Bubble Room but they won\'t be there for long! Bubbles are fragile and eventually pop!
Take a picture and send it to a room, or check out what your friends are up to!
